==Profile==
Midori is a young girl who spends most of her time telling various stories of the world outside Inazuma to her friend [[Kouichi]]. She gets the majority of her information from '[[Ramsay|Uncle Ramsay]]' from the travelogues he writes for her. In [[International Travel Log]], he requests the traveler to help him find inspiration to write his next travelogue for Midori.
